external_references.description: NCSC, CISA, FBI, NSA. (2021, May 7). Further TTPs associated with SVR cyber actors. Retrieved July 29, 2021.

description: For the [SolarWinds Compromise](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0024), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) wrote malware such as [Sibot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0589) in Visual Basic.(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory SVR TTP May 2021)
